name: Refusal or termination of plans
text: §88-220  Refusal or termination of plans.  The state agency shall not finally refuse to approve a plan submitted by a political subdivision under section 88-218, and shall not terminate an approved plan, without reasonable notice and opportunity for hearing to the political subdivision affected thereby. [L 1953, c 217, §5(b); RL 1955, §6-196; HRS §88-220]
